list_definition.definition: a type of strong black coffee made by forcing boiling water or steam through ground coffee beans.
a cup of this type of coffee

list_ex_of_english: Home espresso machines have increased in popularity with the general rise of interest in espresso.
Espresso, coffee and baked goods were served in their cafs.
For caf bombn, the condensed milk is added to the espresso.
Espresso bars are a type of coffeehouse that specialize in serving espresso and espresso-based drinks.
The qualification of the provision of a substantial meal would easily include espresso bars and cafés of that kind.
Its shops offer espresso, coffee, tea, coffee- and tea-based cold and hot specialty drinks, a variety of pastries and other snacks, and coffee supplies.
Peet's primarily retails beans for home brewing, features dark roasts, and did not serve espresso until 1984.
Some upscale espresso bars even offer alcoholic beverages such as grappa and sambuca.
